pages.text: (He) did not give birth/procreate , and was not born/procreated
And (there) was not for Him any equal/match
Say: "I seek protection with/by Lord/master/owner (of) the daybreak/creation
And from bad/evil/harm (of an) intense dark night/moon, when/if (it) penetrated through body pores/ spread/approached
And from bad/evil/harm (of) the female magicians/sorceresses/dischargers in the knots
And from bad/evil/harm (of) an envious with jealousy , when/if he envied with jealousy
Say: "I seek protection with/by the people`s Lord/master/owner
From bad/evil/harm (of) the inspirer and talker/giver of evil suggestions and temptations (whisperer of evil influences), the devil
Who inspires and talks/gives evil suggestions and temptations in the people`s chests (innermosts)
From the Jinns and the people
